page.title: 01A SUMMARY OF OUR AREA
page.content: OUR AREA IS DIVIDED INTO TWO PARTS BY THE LONDON TO SOUTHEND RAILWAY AND THE{A13}ROAD WHICH RUNS PARALLEL FROM SOUTH WEST TO NORTH EAST. THERE IS A BEAUTIFUL{COUNTRYSIDE} AREA NORTH AND NORTHEAST OF THE{A13} THIS INCLUDES FARMLAND,WOODLAND AND ALSO A COUNTRY PARK. SOUTH AND SOUTHEAST OF THE RAILWAY THERE IS A{RESIDENTIAL}AREA WHICH CONSISTS OF THE TOWNS OF STANFORD-LE-HOPE AND{CORRINGHAM}AND ALSO THE VILLAGE OF FOBBING. {CORRINGHAM}AND STANFORD WERE SMALL VILLAGES BUT HAVE EXPANDED IN RECENT YEARS TO FORM AN URBAN AREA COVERING THREE AND A HALF SQUARE KILOMETRES. THERE ARE MANY FACILITIES IN {CORRINGHAM}INCLUDING A NEW TOWN CENTRE,A NEW INTERNATIONAL SUPERMARKET,A BMX BIKE TRACK,A SWIMMING POOL AND ALSO A PUBLIC PARK.
